subject: Order #SSN1843 - Missing screws, used product?
description_text:
Hi there I recently purchased the haptics VAM Pro x3 from you and just had
the time to open and try to install it today. I found out that the booklet
is damaged and has been colored or used. On Top of that, one of the haptic
VAM pros has scratches and damage. I was also provided with 8 out of the 14
screws only, I can't even install them on my simsonn plus x due to the lack
of screws.

Is this a returned or 2nd hand product that you sent me? Very sad and
disappointed.

Please see the picture.

Kindest regards
Jackie

[image: 3a23adcc-6adb-4699-bfc1-de79bb60b5ba.jpg]
[image: d6bc9d95-4e1e-4b2b-8678-32b12b64c102.jpg]
[image: fcce2d81-bb5a-4880-9253-6a8a6f960418.jpg]
[image: 1c9980ce-4f2c-41ab-b09d-5fde739aa750.jpg][image:
e40e39a8-75eb-4758-86dd-0496cdcf969e.jpg][image:
a6ac4408-d9d3-4d6e-a3c3-e53d9bf11b34.jpg][image:
5f70ee82-8589-473d-b944-a6c920652b9c.jpg][image:
f14c47f5-5b7c-4305-91ad-0095ecdafffd.jpg]

Virus-free.www.avast.com
<https://www.avast.com/sig-email?utm_medium=email&utm_source=link&utm_campaign=sig-email&utm_content=webmail>
<#DAB4FAD8-2DD7-40BB-A1B8-4E2AA1F9FDF2>

conversations.body_text: Hi Jackie A,      We're truly sorry for the inconvenience and poor experience.  First, we want to assure you that this is absolutely not a returned item being resold. Due to the high cost of international shipping, returned products have no practical value for recovery.  The motor you received may have minor imperfections on its casing. This is often caused by the anodizing process, where it is very difficult to avoid all surface scratches. Some slight marks may also occur during the mold assembly stage. Regarding the missing manual, we sincerely apologize—this was a packaging oversight and is not a common issue.  Could you please confirm whether you purchased the PlusX or the ProX Ultra pedal set? In the meantime, you can temporarily use replacement screws for installation, and we will arrange to send the correct ones if needed.  For game telemetry, you can use SIMHUB 9.9.3, and our SIMSONN Manager 2.0.9 supports over 10 major racing titles. If you encounter any issues, please feel free to contact us — we're here to help and will respond promptly.

Hi there

Thank you so much for getting back to me in such a short time.

I have been told by my friends that Simsonn is a great product so I
purchased both Simsonn Plus X and Simsonn Gear Shifter from your guys main
store on Ali Express. I was impressed by the many positive reviews hence I
decided to support you guys even more by getting the VAM Pro X (over The
Simmagic Haptics) from your website (Since it was out of stock on Ali). I
was also going to upload my positive review of those on youtube.  In the
near future I planned on slowly investing into the Simsonn Ecosystem such
as The Sequential Shifter and Handbarke etc.

However, as described from the previous email, a few things were missing. 2
of the Vam Pros are attached by 2 / 4 Hex Socket Bolts (M4-10mm) only, as 4
more are missing and a total of 6 missing from the 14 screws that is
supposedly included in the package. I wasn't too fussy about it after you
confirmed it was not a 2nd hand product that you've sent.

I have also tried looking for the missing Bolts but I just couldn't find
the specific M4-10mm Hex socket bolts from any shops that's near where I
live in Auckland, as this particular size is not commonly used in our
country. It would be good if you can send the other 6 missing bolts to me
at your convenience.

In the meantime, I have tested the Vam Pros in both Simhub Licensed and
SImsonn Manager, all working as intended.

Thank you

Regards
Jackie


[image: image.png]
[image: image.png]



On Wed, Jul 16, 2025 at 2:45 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi Jackie A,  Thank you very much for your understanding and continued support of our products. Our sales team has sent you a replacement shipment with 14 screws. The package has already been dispatched, and the tracking number is as follows. Please keep an eye out for delivery.      Here is your tracking number YT2519800705338096, you track it via https://www.yuntrack.com/parcelTracking?id=​YT2519800705338096

Hi guys

Really appreciate the prompt response, just received the screws now. Great
customer support.

Thank you!

[image: 88dedb72-ee91-45bc-91cf-7b426184874b.jpg]

On Thu, Jul 17, 2025 at 8:34 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi Jackie A,  We’re glad to have resolved your issue! Please feel free to contact us anytime if you need further assistance. For the best telemetry experience, please use the latest SIMSONN Manager 2.1.0 and SIMHUB 9.9.3 versions. If you encounter any interference issues, connect the green wire from the control box to any metal screw on the pedal, ensuring the connection point is free of paint for proper conductivity.
